posts.title: Project: Online Marketplace
posts.description: An online marketplace where users can buy and sell goods. Implements user authentication, product listings with categories, search functionality, and secure payment processing.

posts.title: Project: Task Management App
posts.description: A task management application for organizing personal and team tasks. Features include task creation, assignment, priority settings, due dates, and progress tracking.

posts.title: Project: Social Media Platform
posts.description: A social media platform allowing users to create profiles, post updates, follow others, and engage in discussions. Includes notifications, messaging, and content moderation.

posts.title: Project: Fitness Tracker
posts.description: A fitness tracking application to log workouts, set fitness goals, track progress, and provide insights. Integrates with wearable devices and provides analytics.

posts.title: Project: E-Learning Platform
posts.description: An e-learning platform offering courses, quizzes, and certifications. Supports user enrollment, progress tracking, course completion certificates, and course reviews.

posts.title: Project: Event Management System
posts.description: An event management system to organize and manage events, including scheduling, attendee registration, ticketing, venue management, and event analytics.
